name: Dicentric Chromosome Detection
description: YOLO- and CNN-based automated dicentric chromosome detection system, leveraging manually labeled microscopy images and advanced preprocessing to improve efficiency and consistency in radiation dose assessment.

name: Sleep Induction Analysis
description: EEG-based analysis of brain activity during sleep induction, applying MATLAB signal processing and spectral feature extraction on mono- and multichannel data to identify neural patterns in the transition from wakefulness to early sleep stages.
